annotations:
Senior Full Stack JS Engineer (with Python experience)
 Why Join Us?

üîπ 100% remote | üåé Global team | ‚è≥ Full-time 
 
Join a stable, long-term project that‚Äôs been in continuous development for 5+
years. The project offers consistent, meaningful work on a mature financial
services platform. 
 
Project overview: 
It is a comprehensive financial services platform built for an established
insurance and financial services company. The platform handles:

‚Äî Insurance products (motor, life, property, major medical)

‚Äî Loan management (vehicle, personal, mortgage, commercial)

‚Äî Investment and annuity products

‚Äî Digital client services and employee benefits

‚Äî Real-time financial transactions and reporting

‚Äî AI document processing

This is a production system processing real transactions for real customers,
with established business processes and regulatory compliance requirements.

Why This Position is Different? 

‚úÖStable, Long-term Project: Same project for 5+ years, deep domain
expertise

‚úÖ Mature Codebase: Well-structured, documented, with established patterns

‚úÖ Real Business Impact: Your code affects real financial transactions and
client services

‚úÖ Technical Variety: Polyglot architecture (Node.js + Python/Django),
multiple services

‚úÖ Professional Growth: Become an expert in financial services technology 
 
 
What You‚Äôll Do:

Work on a mature financial platform with real business requirements:

‚Äî Maintain and enhance banking/lending features, payment processing, and
compliance workflows

‚Äî Work across our polyglot microservices architecture (Node.js/TypeScript and
Python/Django)

‚Äî Implement complex business logic for insurance products, loan origination,
and investment services

‚Äî Build real-time data processing systems using WebSockets and event-driven
patterns

‚Äî Integrate with third-party services (DocuSign, payment gateways, banking
APIs)

‚Äî Full-stack development from REST APIs to React frontends

‚Äî Ensure transaction integrity and regulatory compliance

‚Äî Collaborate with a stable team that knows the domain deeply 
 

Technical Requirements: 

‚Äî 5+ years Full Stack development with both Node.js/TypeScript AND
Python/Django

‚Äî Strong React.js, Redux, and modern frontend development

‚Äî PostgreSQL expertise including complex queries, transactions, migrations

‚Äî Experience with both Knex/Objection.js (Node) and Django ORM

‚Äî Microservices architecture experience

‚Äî Real-time systems (WebSockets, Socket.io, Celery)

‚Äî AWS and Docker experience

‚Äî RESTful API design with JWT/OAuth authentication

‚Äî Testing frameworks (Jest for Node.js, pytest for Python)

‚Äî Financial or insurance systems experience is a plus

‚Äî Strong English communication (B2-C1)

‚Äî Overlap with Eastern USA timezone for meetings 
 

Tech Stack 
 

Backend:

‚Äî Node.js/TypeScript: Koa.js, Objection.js, Knex.js

‚Äî Python: Django 4.2+, Django REST Framework, Celery

‚Äî PostgreSQL, Redis 
 

Frontend:

‚Äî React, Redux, Material-UI

‚Äî TypeScript, Vite

‚Äî Formik, Yup validation 
 

Infrastructure:

‚Äî AWS (S3, EC2, RDS)

‚Äî Docker, PM2, Gunicorn

‚Äî Socket.io, WebSockets

‚Äî DocuSign, Payment APIs

‚Äî Jest, Supertest, pytest

‚Äî Swagger/OpenAPI 
 

What We Offer

‚Äî Long-term stable position on established project

‚Äî 20 days PTO (25 after 3 years)

‚Äî 10 sick days, national holidays, 2 company days

‚Äî Well-being budget

‚Äî Maternity/paternity leave

‚Äî Professional development reimbursement

‚Äî Hardware as needed

‚Äî Stable, professional team environment

Process

Quick and efficient: HR screening ‚Üí Technical discussion ‚Üí Practical coding
session ‚Üí Offer

Apply now for a stable, long-term position on an established financial
services platform.
